detail_desc: Wide, wrapover skirt in a crêpe weave with a wide grosgrain waistband and a metal buckle at one side. Unlined.
Shorts in a patterned viscose weave with a sheen. Elasticated waist, side pockets and contrasting colour piping at the sides.
Short-sleeved cotton piqué top with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and narrow ribbing at the cuffs.
Calf-length skirt in a patterned viscose weave with a concealed zip in one side and an asymmetric, softly draping, bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Maxi dress in an airy weave with braided details, a double layer at the top and a seam at the waist. Partly lined.
Mesh jacket with reversible sequins, a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Double-breasted coat in felted fabric with narrow notch lapels, welt side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
Coat in soft pile with narrow notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Lined.
Long earrings in metal and plastic with fabric tassels. Length 16 cm.
Jersey playsuit with a smocked bodice, small frill trim at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Short, slightly wider legs.
Cap in woven fabric with a contrasting colour peak, appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Wide top in crêpe slub jersey with a lined drawstring hood, wide, raglan sleeves, slits in the sides and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a collar and button placket. Slim fit.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Short, sleeveless top in jersey containing glittery threads in a narrow cut at the top with an opening and buttons at the back of the neck.
Hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, long sleeves, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Metal rings in various designs.
Court shoes with pointed toes, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 10.5 cm.
Imitation leather trainers with snakeskin-patterned details, a lightly padded top edge and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Dungarees in stretch denim with worn details, adjustable straps with metal fasteners and press-studs at the sides. Flap chest pocket, side pockets, back pockets and a fake fly.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Slip-ons in grained leather with pointed toes, fold-down heels and welt seams. Leather linings and insoles and leather soles.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with a motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Tights containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. 40 denier.
Short jersey skirt with a draped, wrapover front and concealed elastication at the waist.
Sleeveless top in woven fabric with tie-top shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Flared shirt in woven fabric with a gathered grandad collar, buttons down the front and wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with a regular, elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, fake welt back pockets and ankle-length legs with creases.
Oversized jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxy-style top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover hood. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs, and a drawstring at the hem.
Wide blouse in a textured modal and cotton weave with a round, gathered neckline and opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long raglan sleeves with elasticated cuffs.
Fine-knit trainer socks with elasticated tops.
Calf-length skirt in an airy weave with a concealed zip at the back and a softly draping front with an asymmetric hem. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with dropped shoulders and long sleeves. No buttons.
Pyjamas in soft cotton. Jersey T-shirt top with a round neckline. Flannel bottoms with an elasticated waist and fake fly.

Track jacket in padded nylon with a stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Chest pocket and side pockets, all with a concealed zip, and covered elastication at the cuffs. The jacket has a THERMOLITE® T-Down EcoMade filling, which is down-like insulation that is lightweight yet provides superior warmth and breathability. The filling is made entirely from recycled PET fibre.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.

Gently fitted, knee-length coat in a jacquard-weave wool blend with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Welt front pockets with a flap, long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a slight sheen. Detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with an imitation leather tab and a chin guard, and front pockets. Lined.

Pile-lined parka in a cotton weave with padded sleeves, a stand-up collar and pile-lined hood with a detachable faux-fur trim. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and a drawstring at the waist and hem. Flap front pockets with a press-stud and a concealed pocket behind with a press-stud at the top. Elasticated tab with a concealed press-stud at the cuffs, and a small back vent. Lined.
Shorts in stretch, printed denim with covered elastication at the waist, fake front pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Double-layered tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.

Large shopper in cotton canvas with imitation leather details. Two imitation leather handles with studs at the top and narrow, decorative imitation leather straps at the sides. One large inner compartment and imitation suede inside. Unlined. No fasteners. Depth 22.5 cm. Height 35 cm. Width 63 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
5-pocket slim-fit trousers in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.

Calf-length, straight-style dress in a viscose weave with a sheen. Notch lapels, buttons down the front and a tie belt at the waist. Flap chest and front pockets and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a tab and button. Unlined.

Cargo trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening and fake back pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, stretchy cotton jersey in various designs.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist, concealed drawstring, side pockets and mesh side panels in a contrasting colour. Reflective details.

Short, fitted dress in an organic cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Square neckline front and back, a concealed zip at the back and short, wide puff sleeves with pleats at the hems. Lined in a cotton weave.
Round-necked T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.

Dungarees in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with a chest pocket, straps with an adjustable press-stud fastening, and a fake fly. Seam at the waist with belt loops, press-studs at the sides, side pockets, fake back pockets and flap leg pockets. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y). Contrasting colour details.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide, draped polo neck, dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and short slits in the sides.
Fully lined patterned bikini with flounces at the top. Top with narrow shoulder straps and a small metal decoration at one side. Matching bikini bottoms.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and lacing with shimmering metallic plastic links at the sides.
T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with an embroidered pattern, a wide, elasticated neckline and a decorative scalloped trim at the cuffs and hem.
Top in jersey made from recycled polyester with a boat neck and short puff sleeves.
Long, A-line dress in a cotton weave with a low-cut back and wide shoulder straps that cross at the back. Close gathers at the top for added volume and movement. Lining in a cotton weave.

Padded anorak in woven fabric with a lined, padded, drawstring hood and taped zip at the top. Flap front pocket with a press-stud, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Polyester filling. Lined.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Hooded jumper in a cotton knit with a button placket, diagonal front pockets and a small imitation leather appliqué at the hem. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in soft pile with trims around the opening and pockets. Stand up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, kangaroo pockets and long raglan sleeves. Unlined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric made partly from recycled polyester with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neckline and press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a high collar and lined hood with a folding trim around the edge. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and a tab with a press-stud at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Ankle-length trousers in stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, back pockets and super-skinny legs.

Fitted shirt in washed denim with a turn-down collar, a yoke front and back and pearly press-studs down the front. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Set in soft cotton jersey. Top with short, lace butterfly sleeves, a pleat at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Elasticated hairband with a decorative knot.
Long top in slub cotton jersey with a raw-edge neckline, visible seams at the back, twisted side seams, long sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Short skirt in patterned cotton twill with a high waist, detachable belt with metal D-rings and concealed zip fly. Patch pockets at the front and decorative pocket flaps at the back. Unlined.
Running shorts in a double layer of fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Nightdress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short, elasticated raglan sleeves and an elasticated neckline.
Top in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with a text print and a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.
